analysis.description:
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#767) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- investWithCustomerId (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#970-988)
	- invest (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#988-993)
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1055-1060)

Crowdsale.signerAddress (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#772) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1055-1060)

TokenVesting.setVesting (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1556-1587) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- vestingSchedule.amount == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol:
	Contract EthTranchePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1489-1494)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1025-1037):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1035)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1037)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#869-910):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#873-884)
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#877-884)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#885-889)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#900)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#898-900)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.setVesting (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1556-1587):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(LALAToken.balanceOf(this) >= safeAdd(totalUnreleasedTokens,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1581)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalUnreleasedTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1582-1583)
	- vestingMap (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1583)
	- vestingMap (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1585)
	- vestingMap (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1585-1587)

BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1288-1302) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(teamAddresses[i],allocatedBonus) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1301-1302)

MintedEthCappedCrowdsale.assignTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1338-1342) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mintableToken.mint(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1341-1342)

TokenVesting.releaseVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1597-1601) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-LALAToken.transfer(_adr,amountToRelease) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol)

BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(teamAddresses[i],allocatedBonus) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1301-1302)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#833-851):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#843)

	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#847)

	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#845-846)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.allocate (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#922-965):
	External calls:
	- weiAmount = (weiPrice * tokenAmount) / 10 ** uint256(token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#928-930)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#934-937)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#933-934)

Reentrancy in BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1288-1302):
	External calls:
	- tokensSold = crowdsale.tokensSold() (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1291-1294)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedBonus (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1295-1299)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#869-910):

	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#877-884)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#885-889)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.releaseVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1597-1601):
	External calls:
	- LALAToken.transfer(_adr,amountToRelease) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalUnreleasedTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1160-1176) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1172-1175)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1171-1175)

TokenVesting.setVesting (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1556-1587) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _startAt == 0 (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1569-1571)
	- vestingSchedule.amount == 0 (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1575-1583)
	- require(bool)(_amount != 0 || vestingSchedule.amount > 0) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1564-1567)
	- require(bool)(LALAToken.balanceOf(this) >= safeAdd(totalUnreleasedTokens,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1581)

TokenVesting.isVestingSet (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1587-1588) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- vestingMap[adr].amount != 0 (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1588)

TokenVesting.releaseVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol#1597-1601) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(safeSub(vestingSchedule.amount,vestingSchedule.amountReleased) > 0) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol)
	- require(bool)(vestingSchedule.cliff <= totalSteps) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol)
	- totalReleasableAmount > vestingSchedule.amount (/unique_chucks/2/0xfd107b473ab90e8fbd89872144a3dc92c40fa8c9.sol)
